UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Prokaryotic Selectivity, Bactericidal Mechanism and LPS-neutralizing Activity of Lys-linked Dimeric Peptide of Indolicidin C-terminal Hexapeptide
Literature.Author: Shin SY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=32µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=16µg/ml)
